summary: Updated skill-team-implement Stage 2 to parse structured Dependencies field from plans. Added three-step algorithm (parse, build graph, compute waves), backward compatibility mode for plans without Dependencies field, and error handling for circular dependencies, invalid references, and malformed fields.

artifacts.summary: Updated Stage 2 with dependency parsing algorithm, backward compatibility, and error handling; Stage 6 updated with cross-reference

completion_data.completion_summary: Replaced heuristic dependency analysis in skill-team-implement with explicit Dependencies field parsing. Added topological sort wave computation, backward compatibility mode (sequential fallback), and error handling for circular/invalid/malformed dependencies.
completion_data.claudemd_suggestions: Modified .claude/skills/skill-team-implement/SKILL.md Stage 2 (dependency parsing algorithm) and Stage 6 (cross-reference to Stage 2 waves)

next_steps: Review implementation and run /todo to archive completed task
